item.title: Conan O'Brien honored at Kennedy Center; Trump targeted by many comics
item.description: As Conan O'Brien was honored with the Mark Twain Prize at the Kennedy Center, many comics targeted President Trump from the stage.

item.title: Wildfires in the Carolinas prompt evacuations, emergency declarations
item.description: For the second time in less than a month​, residents in one North Carolina county have faced evacuations due to wildfires.

item.title: Stocks jump amid signs Trump could scale back tariffs
item.description: Dow surges more than 500 points as White House signals that President Trump might narrow scope of planned tariffs.

item.title: The Puzzling Death of Susann Sills
item.description: The wife of a fertility doctor is found dead at the bottom of a staircase. Did her dogs play a role in her death or was the scene staged to cover a mu...

item.title: Gérard Depardieu goes on trial in France accused of sexual assaults
item.description: French cinema icon Gérard Depardieu stands accused of sexually assaulting two women during the filming of Les Volets Verts (The Green Shutters) in Par...
